net.siot.android.gateway.service

Class SensorServiceMobile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • net.siot.android.gateway.service.SensorServiceMobile

  • public class SensorServiceMobile
extends Service
    Pre-configured SensorService for mobile devices which will be connected to siot.net. Created by Sathesh Paramasamy on 12.10.15.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorServiceMobile

        public SensorServiceMobile(Context ctx,
                           java.lang.String sCenterGUID,
                           MQTTClient mqttClient)
        Constructor for SensorServiceMobile.
        Parameters:
        ctx - needed because android sensor must have an Context
        sCenterGUID - for publishes and subscribes to and from the correct siot.net center
        mqttClient - mqttClient which manages the connection to the MQTT broker

      • registerSensor

        public void registerSensor(Sensor sensor)
        RegisterSensor notifies siot.net that a new sensor has connected. A manifest message is generated and publish to the MQTT broker.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor to register on siot.net

      • addSensorGUID

        private void addSensorGUID(java.lang.String GUID,
                           int sensorType,
                           java.lang.String sensorValueName)
        Adds a sensors GUID to the helper map sensorMap.
        Parameters:
        GUID - sensor GUID
        sensorType - sensor type
        sensorValueName - value name description (e.g. "x" or "pressure")

      • getSensorGUID

        private java.lang.String getSensorGUID(int sensorType,
                                       java.lang.String sensorValueName)
        Getting the GUID from a already registered sensor out of the helper map sensorMap.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - sensor type
        sensorValueName - value name description (e.g. "y" or "proximity")
        Returns:

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay(Sensor sensor,
                     int latency)
        Changes latency on a sensor.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor
        latency - latency value

      • sendSensorData

        public void sendSensorData(int sensorType,
                           java.lang.String sensorGUID,
                           java.lang.String values)
        Sends the sensor data to the connected MQTT Broker. It filters out data from the same sensor within 200 millis, protecting the mqttClient overwhelming the network. This method starts a executorService in the background, not blocking the application while sending the data.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - sensor type
        sensorGUID - sensor GUID
        values - sensor value

      • sendSensorDataInBackground

        private void sendSensorDataInBackground(int sensorType,
                                        java.lang.String sensorGUID,
                                        java.lang.String values)
        Publishes sensor data to the MQTT broker. It is called by the executor Thread out of method sendSensorData().
        Parameters:
        sensorType - sensor type
        sensorGUID - sensor GUID
        values - sensor values

      • startListener

        public void startListener(Sensor sensor)
        Starts a listener of the stated sensor and registers it to siot.net.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor

      • stopListener

        public void stopListener(Sensor sensor)
        Stops a listener of the stated sensor.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor
